Step 1.Planning: Pick up the seashell from the sand

Step 2.Planning: Move the seashell to the countertop

Step 3.Planning: Pick up the rag from the countertop

Step 4.Planning: Dip the rag into the water in the sink

Step 5.Planning: Clean the seashell with the wet rag

Step 6.Planning: Place the seashell back on the countertop

Step 7.Planning: Repeat steps 1-6 for the remaining seashells
